title: Understanding Date Utilities in GMH Communities
text: vignette explains date utility functions GMH Communities package, focusing nuances leasing periods, pre-lease seasons, weekly calculations.

title: Understanding Date Utilities in GMH Communities
text: GMH Communities leasing cycle structured around academic year: Pre-Lease Season: September 1st July 31st Primary Leasing Period: Begins August 1st Transition Month: August

title: Understanding Date Utilities in GMH Communities
text: leasing period typically starts August 1st ends July 31st following year.
code: # Get the current leasing period leasing_period <- get_leasing_period() print(leasing_period) #> $start #> [1] "2024-08-01" #>  #> $end #> [1] "2025-08-01"  # Get the start date of the current leasing period start_date <- get_leasing_period_start_date() print(start_date) #> [1] "2024-08-01"  # Get the end date of the current leasing period end_date <- get_leasing_period_end_date() print(end_date) #> [1] "2025-08-01"

title: Understanding Date Utilities in GMH Communities
text: pre-lease season starts September 1st ends July 31st following year, overlapping current leasing period.
code: # Get the pre-lease year pre_lease_year <- get_pre_lease_year() print(pre_lease_year) #> [1] 2025  # Get the pre-lease season dates pre_lease_season <- get_pre_lease_season() print(pre_lease_season) #> $start #> [1] "2025-09-01" #>  #> $end #> [1] "2026-07-31"

title: Understanding Date Utilities in GMH Communities
text: Weekly calculations based leasing period help track progress throughout year.
code: # Get the current leasing week leasing_week <- get_leasing_week() print(leasing_week) #> $start #> [1] "2025-01-13" #>  #> $end #> [1] "2025-01-19"  # Get the number of weeks left to lease weeks_left <- get_weeks_left_to_lease() print(weeks_left) #> [1] 33

title: Understanding Date Utilities in GMH Communities
text: August Transition: August crucial month, marking end one pre-lease season beginning primary leasing period. Year Calculations: get_pre_lease_year() function determines appropriate year based current date, considering September 1st cutoff. Date Formatting: Use entrata_date() Entrata API compatibility http_date() parsing HTTP date strings.

title: Understanding Date Utilities in GMH Communities
text: Understanding date utilities crucial accurate leasing calculations reporting GMH Communities. Always consider context academic year working functions. vignette provides overview date utility functions, explains structure leasing cycle, demonstrates usage key functions. also highlights important considerations specific GMH Communities’ leasing process. details individual functions parameters, refer package documentation function references.

what: Create a Leasing Calendar Schedule Table — create_leasing_calendar
title: Create a Leasing Calendar Schedule Table — create_leasing_calendar
text: function generates leasing calendar schedule table given start year number years. leasing season defined starting September 1st ending August 1st following year. table includes following columns: date: date sequence. calendar_year: calendar year date. leasing_year: leasing year corresponding date. leasing_season_end_date: end date leasing season leasing year. leasing_season_start_date: start date leasing season leasing year. leasing_week: week number within leasing season. weeks_left_to_lease: number weeks left lease end leasing season. is_current_leasing_season: logical indicating date within current leasing season.

title: Create a Leasing Calendar Schedule Table — create_leasing_calendar
Create a Leasing Calendar Schedule Table — create_leasing_calendar
text: start_year starting year leasing calendar. Defaults 2023. num_years number years generate leasing calendar . Defaults 3.

title: Create a Leasing Calendar Schedule Table — create_leasing_calendar
text: tibble containing leasing calendar schedule.

title: Date Formatting and Coercion — date_formatting
text: functions handle date formatting coercion ensure consistency date representations throughout application. particularly important working dates different sources different formats. following functions defined: coerce_date(): Coerces date string Date object. entrata_date(): Formats Date object Entrata's date format (MM/DD/YYYY). parse_entrata_date(): Parses date string Entrata's date format. http_date(): Creates HTTP date following RFC 1123 format.

title: Database Configuration — db_config
text: Functions retrieve validate database configuration. get_db_config(): retrieves database configuration specified configuration file returns configuration list. can optionally specify key retrieve specific configuration value. validate_db_config(): validates database configuration ensure required configuration keys present.

title: Database Configuration — db_config
code: get_db_config(   key = NULL,   file = Sys.getenv("R_CONFIG_FILE", pkg_sys("config/config.yml")),   config = Sys.getenv("R_CONFIG_ACTIVE", "default") )  validate_db_config(   cfg,   arg = rlang::caller_arg(cfg),   call = rlang::caller_env() )

title: Database Configuration — db_config
text: key Character string representing configuration key retrieve. Defaults NULL returns full configuration list. file character string representing path configuration file. config character string representing configuration use configuration file. cfg List containing configuration values string path configuration file. NULL, default configuration file path used.

title: Database Configuration — db_config
text: get_db_config(): list, vector (key specified), corresponding contents db configuration key's values (.e. dbname, host, port, username, password). key specified, function return value corresponding specified key. validate_db_config(): invisible NULL configuration valid. function throw error configuration invalid.

title: Connect to GMH Database — db_connect
text: Functions connect, disconnect, manage database connection GMH PostgreSQL database. db_connect(): Connect GMH PostgreSQL database. db_disconnect(): Disconnect GMH PostgreSQL database. db_checkout(): Check connection database connection pool. db_return(): Return connection database connection pool.

title: Connect to GMH Database — db_connect
code: db_connect(db_config = get_db_config(), user_id = NULL)  db_disconnect(conn)  db_checkout(conn)  db_return(conn)

title: Connect to GMH Database — db_connect
text: db_config Database configuration values list. configuration values include following keys: host, port, dbname, user, password minimum. left NULL, retrieve configuration via get_db_config() function. user_id integer representing user id use database connection. provided, function attempt retrieve user id shiny session object. function running inside shiny app, default user id 0 used. conn database connection object.

title: Connect to GMH Database — db_connect
text: pool object representing connection pool GMH PostgreSQL database.

title: Connect to GMH Database — db_connect
text: db_connect() function establishes connection pool GMH PostgreSQL database hosted Google Cloud SQL using pool package. Additionally, function performs following: Sets automatic disconnect cleanup connection pool R shiny session ends. Sets app.user_id database session variable Stores connection pool shiny session object Stores user id shiny session object Sets db.pool option connection pool

title: Shared Parameters — .shared-params
text: parameters used multiple functions throughout package. defined make easier update one place. use parameters function, simply include following function's documentation:

title: Shared Parameters — .shared-params
text: as_of_date Date use reference point deriving dates . Defaults current system date. conn database connection object. pool database connection pool object. key Character string representing configuration key retrieve. Defaults NULL returns full configuration list. file character string representing path configuration file. config character string representing configuration use configuration file. cfg List containing configuration values string path configuration file. NULL, default configuration file path used. entrata_config Entrata API Configuration values list. configuration values include following keys: username, password, base_url minimum. left NULL, retrieve configuration via get_entrata_config() function. db_config Database configuration values list. configuration values include following keys: host, port, dbname, user, password minimum. left NULL, retrieve configuration via get_db_config() function. gmaps_config Google Maps API configuration values list. configuration values include following keys: api_key minimum. left NULL, retrieve configuration via get_gmaps_config() function. request_id unique identifier request. used track request response.  left NULL, unique identifier generated via .integer(Sys.time()). endpoint Entrata API endpoint send request . must valid Entrata API endpoint path. left NULL, endpoint appended request's URL. See details get available Entrata API endpoints. method_name name Entrata API "method" (operation) use request. confused HTTP request method (.e. GET, POST, etc.), method must method available specified endpoint argument, making conditional supplied endpoint. left NULL, pre-defined default method used depending supplied endpoint. example, default method /properties endpoint getProperties. See details get available Entrata API methods endpoint. method_version version Entrata API method use request. conditional supplied method_name argument must valid version given method name. left NULL, pre-defined default version used depending supplied method_name. Note Entrata API method versions one "r1", "r2", "r3". method_params named, potentially nested list request method parameters pass Entrata API. parameters added request body's method.params object. Depending supplied endpoint, method_name, method_version, required parameters vary required, optional, default values. left NULL, required method parameters without default values throw error.

what: gmhdatahub: Shiny Dashboard and API Client for GMH Communities Leasing Data — gmhdatahub-package
title: gmhdatahub: Shiny Dashboard and API Client for GMH Communities Leasing Data — gmhdatahub-package
text: Provides Shiny dashboard API client interactingwith GMH Communities leasing data via Entrata API. Includesfunctions API authentication, data retrieval, datavisualization.

title: gmhdatahub: Shiny Dashboard and API Client for GMH Communities Leasing Data — gmhdatahub-package
text: Maintainer: Jimmy Briggs jimmy.briggs@jimbrig.com (ORCID) Authors: Patrick Howard patrick.howard@noclocks.dev [reviewer] contributors: Clocks, LLC team@noclocks.dev [copyright holder, funder]

title: Leasing Period — leasing_period
text: functions handle calculations related leasing period student housing. leasing period typically spans academic year, starting August 1st ending July 31st following year. following functions defined: get_leasing_period(): Returns start end dates current leasing period. get_leasing_period_start_date(): Returns start date current leasing period. get_leasing_period_end_date(): Returns end date current leasing period.

title: Leasing Period — leasing_period
code: get_leasing_period(as_of_date = Sys.Date())  get_leasing_period_start_date(as_of_date = Sys.Date())  get_leasing_period_end_date(as_of_date = Sys.Date())

title: Leasing Period — leasing_period
text: as_of_date Date use reference point deriving dates . Defaults current system date.

title: Leasing Period — leasing_period
text: get_leasing_period(): list containing start end dates current leasing period. get_leasing_period_start_date(): start date current leasing period. get_leasing_period_end_date(): end date current leasing period.

title: Leasing Week — leasing_week
text: Calculates start end dates leasing week given "" date. leasing week defined starting specific day week (e.g., Monday, Sunday, etc.). Lubridate supports multiple ways specifying week_start. following functions defined: get_leasing_week(): Returns start end dates leasing week. get_leasing_week_start_date(): Returns start date leasing week. get_leasing_week_end_date(): Returns end date leasing week. get_leasing_week_number(): Returns week number leasing week.

title: Leasing Week — leasing_week
code: get_leasing_week(as_of_date = Sys.Date(), week_start = "Monday")  get_leasing_week_start_date(as_of_date = Sys.Date(), week_start = "Monday")  get_leasing_week_end_date(as_of_date = Sys.Date(), week_start = "Monday")  get_leasing_week_number(as_of_date = Sys.Date())

title: Leasing Week — leasing_week
text: as_of_date Date use reference point deriving dates . Defaults current system date. week_start week start day (Default 7, Sunday. Set lubridate.week.start override). Full abbreviated names days week can English provided current locale.

title: Leasing Week — leasing_week
text: get_leasing_week(): list containing start end dates leasing week. get_leasing_week_start_date(): start date leasing week. get_leasing_week_end_date(): end date leasing week. get_leasing_week_number(): week number leasing week.

what: Pre-Lease Season and Leasing Cycle — pre_lease_season
title: Pre-Lease Season and Leasing Cycle — pre_lease_season
text: functions handle calculations related pre-lease season overall leasing cycle student housing. pre-lease season period leasing upcoming academic year typically occurs. following functions defined: get_pre_lease_year(): Returns year upcoming pre-lease season. get_pre_lease_season(): Returns start end dates upcoming pre-lease season. get_pre_lease_season_start_date(): Returns start date upcoming pre-lease season. get_leasing_period_end_date(): Returns end date current leasing period.

title: Pre-Lease Season and Leasing Cycle — pre_lease_season
code: get_pre_lease_year(as_of_date = Sys.Date())  get_pre_lease_season(as_of_date = Sys.Date())  get_pre_lease_season_start_date(as_of_date = Sys.Date())  get_entrata_custom_pre_lease_date(as_of_date = Sys.Date())

title: Pre-Lease Season and Leasing Cycle — pre_lease_season
text: as_of_date Date use reference point deriving dates . Defaults current system date.

title: Pre-Lease Season and Leasing Cycle — pre_lease_season
text: get_pre_lease_year(): year upcoming pre-lease season starts. get_pre_lease_season(): list containing start end dates upcoming pre-lease season. get_pre_lease_season_start_date(): start date upcoming pre-lease season. get_leasing_period_end_date(): end date current leasing period.

title: Pre-Lease Season and Leasing Cycle — pre_lease_season
text: pre-lease season starts September 1st ends July 31st following year. actual leasing period begins August 1st. current date September 1st, functions return dates upcoming pre-lease season. September 1st later, return dates pre-lease season just begun. approach aligns typical academic calendars, new leases often begin around start fall semester (August 1st), pre-leasing next year starts shortly .

title: Pre-Lease Season and Leasing Cycle — pre_lease_season

title: Date-Related Utilities — utils_dates
text: collection date-related utility functions used throughout GMH Data Hub application. functions handle various aspects date manipulation, including leasing weeks, pre-lease seasons, general date formatting.

title: Date-Related Utilities — utils_dates
text: Dates particular importance GMH Data Hub application, used calculate leasing weeks, pre-lease seasons, time-based metrics. functions help ensure consistency date calculations formatting throughout application. functions grouped several categories: Leasing Week: Functions related calculating start end dates leasing week. Pre-Lease Season: Functions determining start end dates pre-lease season. Leasing Period: Functions calculating start end dates leasing period. Weeks Left Lease: Determine number weeks left lease start next leasing period. Weekly Period: Functions working weekly periods. Date Formatting Coercion: Functions formatting coercing date strings Date objects.

title: Date-Related Utilities — utils_dates
text: Leasing Week: period starting specific day week, depending "reporting cycle" used leasing-related calculations, ending day next leasing week starts. Pre-lease Season: period leasing upcoming academic year typically occurs. GMH, generally September 1st current year July 31st following year. Leasing Period: full duration lease, often spanning academic year (August 1st July 31st). Weekly Period: period seven days, typically used reporting purposes. Entrata Date Format: date format used Entrata, property management software used GMH.

title: Date-Related Utilities — utils_dates
text: get_leasing_week(): Returns start end dates leasing week. get_leasing_week_start_date(): Returns start date leasing week. get_leasing_week_end_date(): Returns end date leasing week. get_leasing_week_number(): Returns week number leasing week. get_pre_lease_year(): Returns year pre-lease season. get_pre_lease_season(): Returns start end dates pre-lease season. get_pre_lease_season_start_date(): Returns start date pre-lease season. get_leasing_period(): Returns start end dates leasing period. get_leasing_period_start_date(): Returns start date leasing period. get_leasing_period_end_date(): Returns end date leasing period. get_weeks_left_to_lease(): Returns number weeks left pre-lease season. get_weekly_period(): Returns start end dates weekly period. get_weekly_period_start_date(): Returns start date weekly period. coerce_date(): Coerces date string Date object. entrata_date(): Formats Date object Entrata's date format. http_date(): Creates HTTP date following RFC 1123 format.

title: Weekly Period — weekly_period
text: functions handle calculations related weekly periods, typically used reporting purposes. weekly period defined period seven days. following functions defined: get_weekly_period(): Returns start end dates weekly period. get_weekly_period_start_date(): Returns start date weekly period. need function calculate end date weekly period, simply "" date.

title: Weekly Period — weekly_period
text: as_of_date Date use reference point deriving dates . Defaults current system date.

title: Weekly Period — weekly_period
text: get_weekly_period(): list containing start end dates weekly period. get_weekly_period_start_date(): start date weekly period.
